title: Snow day scuttler icon
body: Hello. I read that if I gifted a friend any item during snow down I would receive the snow day scuttler icon. I gifted my friend snow storm sivir yesterday and I have not received the icon. Is there any way I could get it still?

replies.body: Snowdown icons are not done being distributed yet.  We're aiming to have it completed by January 23rd.  Hang on until then, and the goodies will come!
